title: Sonne
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Eins, zwei, drei, vier, fünf, sechs, sieben, acht, neun, aus
lines.translation: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, out
lines.grammar: German line: Explain verb-final clauses, separable prefixes, and case articles (der/die/das). Key phrase: 'Eins, zwei, drei, vier, fünf, sechs, sieben, acht, neun, aus' → 'One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, out'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.
